title: John Wu
text:

title: Experience
text:
Experience
UC Investments (The Office of the Chief Investment Officer of the Regents) Oakland, CA
UC Investments Academy October 2023 - Present Analyze financial statements through core statements, MD&A, footnotes, and ratios for activity, liquidity, coverage, and leverage Determine corporate valuation by public/acquisition comparables, DCF, merger consequences, and leveraged buyouts analysis Used best practices in Excel to construct consistent, efficient, and clear financial models
University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) Los Angeles, CA Housing Safety Supervisor March 2023 - July 2023 Responded promptly to and documented reports regarding on-campus housing incidents Delivered effective supervision, training, and scheduling for the Housing Safety Ambassador (HSA) team Performed patrols of on-campus residential buildings, ensuring residentsâ€™ well-being and supporting the HSA team during shifts Collaborated closely with campus partners (UCPD, UCLA Fire, LAFD, Residential Life, UCLA EMS, and Community Service Officers)
Housing Safety Ambassador (HSA) November 2022 - March 2023 Monitored lobby and entrance activity for unusual disturbances Assisted in responding to emergencies and mediated conflicts Ensured proper functioning of access control hardware to maintain a secure environment Demonstrated effective communication skills while interacting with emergency responders and the general public
Oakland Military Institute (OMI) Oakland, CA Inventory and Maintenance Assistant May 2019 - August 2019 Distributed and cataloged an accurate inventory of uniform items, received and verified shipments Allocated supplies for school-wide events, including military parades and summer camps serving 400+ incoming students Handled diverse tasks, including construction, destruction, custodial duties, and large furniture relocation in campus classrooms
